sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: ROANOAK an island of North America, near the coast of North Carolina. Here the English first attempted to settle in 1585, but were obliged to leave it for want of provisions. Long. 75. 0. E. Lat. 35. 40. N.

p.hi: Roanoak, a river of North America, which rises in Virginia, runs through Carolina, and at length falls into the sea, where it forms a long narrow bay called Albemarle Sound.
